channel.title: Hilltoppk Brand new server-->> We still have open staff spots
channel.description:
Hey guys im here today to tell you that HilltopPK a new rsps has arrived. The owners are very friendly, i am a co owner myself you can always message me ingame my name is Vince6, let me know if u saw this thread and this is why you joined and i will give u a special item (of my choice).
Webclient: http:// rs-ps .org /play.php?server=HILLTOPPKV3 (remove spaces) Homepage: http://hilltoppk.tk/
We are giving the opportunity to give out staff spots to the few lucky people who join. This is what we have in our server so far:- - Working Chaotics - Working Korasi's Special - Functional PKing - Bosses - Donor Zone - Staff Zone (Still a work in progress) - Mini games -Functional Slayer - All spell books - Curse Prayers - Slayer point system - PKing point system
And much much more... So download today, and join in and help us kick off our starting community
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fJtJIWROoNI
Join today! Remember if you joined because you saw this thread message Vince6 he will give u a special item (of his choice).
